items.content_html: A lightweight React CRUD application that Perform Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations with an intuitive user interface. Ideal for learning React or as a quick setup for CRUD-based projects. Uses React, React Router, Axios for API requests, and Bootstrap for a clean UI.
items.title: 00123nikhil/react-crud-app: A lightweight React CRUD application that Perform Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations with an intuitive user interface. Ideal for learning React or as a quick setup for CRUD-based projects. Uses React, React Router, Axios for API requests, and Bootstrap for a clean UI.
